mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_company ( username ,company_name, id_card,phone,email, password,salt, avatar, created_user,created_time, modified_user,modified_time )VALUES( #{userName},#{companyName}, #{idCard},#{phone}, #{email},#{avatar}, #{password}, #{salt},#{createdUser}, #{createdTime},#{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT cid, username, company_name, password, avatar, salt FROM t_company WHERE company_name=#{companyName}
SELECT cid, username, company_name, password, avatar, salt FROM t_company WHERE phone=#{phone}
